recipe.title: Montys Pancakes
recipe.step: Beat eggs in a medium bowl and add other ingredients and mix well.
In a medium saucepan that is heated to medium to hot heat spray oil and pour in about 3/4 cup of mixture.
Tilt the pan around so mixture spreads out.
Once bubbles pop in the middle, flip pancake to cook the other side.
Once golden on underside, transfer to a plate and serve with a sprinkle of sugar and some lime juice (or other ingredients like jam and cream.
